name: OR_CASE_SCHED_HIST
description: The OR_CASE_SCHED_HIST table contains OR management system case scheduling history.

columns.name: OR_CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the case record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of the OR scheduling history information.

columns.name: ROOM_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the operating room in which the case was scheduled.

columns.name: HIST_DATE
columns.description: The date on which the case was scheduled.

columns.name: HIST_SCHED_USER_ID
columns.description: The ID of the user that scheduled the case.

columns.name: HIST_SCHED_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: HIST_SCHED_TIME
columns.description: The time at which the user scheduled the case.

columns.name: MATCH_SRVC_BLOCK_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the matching service block ID of the schedule instance if the match type is a service block.
